Key Match Events: Bowden Francis took a no-hitter into 6th inning
Vladimir Guerrero Jr. doubled to right, scoring Serven in the 3rd inning
Eric Clement doubled to left, scoring Barger in the 6th inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the 4th in the regular season series between the Blue Jays and Red Sox, with the series tied 2-2
Others: The game was played at Fenway Park in Boston, Massachusetts, with an attendance of 31,712
